name: Bleib Warm, Pinguin!
description:
Bleib warm - Pinguin! / Keep warm - penguin!

Download the standalone version for a better experience.

Game jam BPB 2018: Game jam for respect and against violence:
What can we do to prevent radicalization?

https://game-jam.bpb.de

Our approach:

Keep your local radicals warm: Drag the unhappy penguins from the brink of the ice shelf back into the middle of the colony to keep them warm. 

Team:

  • Programming: Nikolai Reinke, Johannes Deml
  • Sound Design: Jan von Meppen
  • Character Design: Kasia Kohl
  • Character Animation: Eva Hambach
  • 3D Art: Andreas Gaschka
